title: Drawing, "Zeus Deciding on the Destiny of Troy, Palazzo Gessi, Faenza", 1813
medium: Pen and ink over graphite on light blue paper
markings: Watermark: lily in double circle above A F C
inscribed: Inscribed: Concilio generale delli dei Giove decide del destino di Troia.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Zeus upon throne in center of big assembly of gods. He raises right arm and in act of rising. Caption: Concilio generale delli dei Giove decide del destino di Troia.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Zeus Deciding on the Destiny of Troy, Palazzo Gessi, Faenza", 1813.
1813. Pen and ink over graphite on light blue paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1640.
